name: Jammers
description:
A simple rhythm game where you have to use the arrow keys to push the inputs and match with the beat of the song!

I do not own any of the songs and this is purely for a simple prototype. All credits to the original artists:

1st Song: BGM - 【フリーBGM】 VANKETT / ぴろぱる【明るい・民族調】by ぴろぱる
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F0lAK_kL9o0)

2nd Song: Kawaii White Lion [Hololive][Shishiro Botan][BGM] by minari studio みなりスタジオ
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F20f9kchk6k)

3rd Song: おもちゃのダンス @ フリby BGM DOVA-SYNDROME OFFICIAL 

(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kKg-aXVS1YI)

Secret Song: Padoru Padoru (Azure Project Remix) by SterlingEDM

(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GBxGAuXLwr8)
